mireka.filter.local.table
Interface RecipientDestinationMapper

All Known Implementing Classes:
AliasMapper, ForwardLists, GlobalUsersMaildropDestinationMapper, LocalRecipientTable, MailingLists, PostmasterAliasMapper, RecipientSpecificationDestinationPair, RecipientTable
public interface RecipientDestinationMapper

RecipientDestinationMapper maps recipients to destinations.

Method Summary
 Destination lookup(Recipient recipient)
          Returns the destination of mails sent to this user; or null if it does not know the recipient.
 

Method Detail

lookup

Returns the destination of mails sent to this user; or null if it does not know the recipient.
